forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: dialog backsides

comments.text: some dialogs have further information or buttons on the backside. have a look at the area dialog, for instance.
when on the desktop version, you can also turn around a dialog by pressing f4.

thread.latestCommentText: when on the desktop version, you can also turn around a dialog by pressing f4.
